IGRD.QA.summary: Investment Holding Group - Q.P.S.C., together with its subsidiaries, engages in various trading and investment activities in Qatar. It operates through four segments: Contracting, Specialized Contracting, Trading, and Water Treatment & Related Maintenance. The company undertakes projects related to hotels, airports, conference centers, and educational facilities, as well as offers civil contracting services. It also engages in the trading of fire alarms, security systems, and related contracting activities; contracting for wellness and pools, water features, water treatments, and after sale maintenance and services; and installation and maintenance of electro mechanical works. In addition, the company is involved in the trading of electrical equipment, switch gears, light and instrument electrical tools, and electrical and construction materials; and wood, steel, food, chemical, and building materials, as well as engages in electromechanical equipment installation and maintenance works. Further, it offers mechanical, electrical, and plumbing contracting services. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Doha, Qatar.
